metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18405 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** jQuery v2.2.2 allows XSS via a crafted onerror attribute of an IMG element. NOTE: this vulnerability has been reported to be spam entry.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this CVE has been disputed, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: jquery: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
